description: Sunset beers, neon nights and barefoot mornings â€” the soundtrack for Pattaya hostel afternoons.

items.name: Fun Dee Hostel
items.description: The hostel is close to the Jomtien beach and easily accessible via public transport. It is close to South Pattaya and getting to the town is easy due to the great transport facilities available from here. The place is quiet and the rooms are clean and tidy and a great pick for both solo travelers and groups. The staff is hospitable and friendly. Don't forget to try the breakfast menu here!

items.name: Happy Hostel Pattaya
items.location_hint: 332/9 M 9 Soi Chaloem Phrakiat 21/1, Pattaya Sai 3 Road Nongprue Banglamung, Pattaya 20150

items.name: 18 Coins Cafe & Hostel
items.description: Close to the beach, this hostel too is at a central location. The rooms are spacious and clean. The linens are changed on a regular basis. The property is in a quiet location and the management takes great care of it which makes it a great place to relax. The hostel also offers a complimentary breakfast. Apart from the hostel dorms, one can also find private rooms here.

items.name: The Bedrooms Hostel
items.description: Looking for a hostel close to the beach? The beach is right across the street from this property. And you know what? The spa next door gives a discount! The rooms are clean and comfortable with modern furnishings. The staff is warm, helpful, and friendly. Though a hostel, it almost seems like a hotel due to the commendable facilities the place offers.

items.name: Tweet Tweet Nest
items.location_hint: 522/10-11 Moo 10, Soi 8, Nongprue Sub District, Banglamung District, Pattaya 20260

items.name: Asia BackPackers
items.description: This is the top Pattaya backpackers hostel, and a lively place surrounded by Pattaya's best bars and restaurants. The location makes it a top choice as it is just 4 km away from the Pattaya railway station, and also very close to the beach. The hostel offers private rooms along with mixed and female only dorms. There is ample space to put in one's luggage as the rooms come with lockers and bunk beds. There is also an amazing 24 hour cafe/bar at this vibrant property. It is a perfect option for party hostels in Pattaya.
